backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister handling tasks, user profiles, dental avatars, access control, and task completion with photo evidence.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature reports with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels for recent app changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing UI components, hooks, and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining theme variables, dark mode colors, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication flow, role selection, profile onboarding, and rendering the app shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Empty placeholder file for the removed manager confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen allowing role selection and optional manager token input before initiating Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: UI for selecting assistant or manager role, handling stored pending selections and triggering role selection mutations.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty file placeholder for avatar manifest data.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Renders a grid of selectable dental avatars, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Displays an avatar’s SVG by ID, falling back to a placeholder when unavailable.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Exports badge definitions containing ids, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Slide-out panel listing all badges and marking which have been earned using translations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header with user menu, avatar, settings, badges, theme toggle, and logout behavior.
Main app layout managing tabs, routing between pages, and rendering header and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown allowing users to switch between supported languages via i18n.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button for toggling between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Table showing completed tasks with user details, comments, and photo indicators.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Generates a bar chart summarizing number of task completions per user.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Select component for choosing a user by Principal, displaying usernames and avatars.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Renders a horizontal tab bar and triggers onTabChange when a tab is clicked.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Form for adding or subtracting overtime with date validation; backend action currently disabled and shows an error.
Displays a sorted list of overtime entries with date, minutes, type, and optional comment.
Calculates and shows total overtime minutes and their conversion into workdays with remainder.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Provides data export and account deletion options by exporting cached data and clearing local identity.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Onboarding modal for creating a user profile with username, initials, avatar, and role assignment.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Editable profile settings panel for updating username and avatar, with access to privacy tools.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for completing a task including optional comment and before/after photo uploads.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog component for creating a task, handling title/type input and submitting via createTask hook.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays a task with status, type badges, completion info, and a button to mark completion.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Sorts tasks by completion and priority, then renders them as TaskCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller’s user role and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Derives earned badges from overtime and task completion counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches dental avatar data from the backend and provides avatar lookup by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context for translations, enforcing provider presence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Empty file placeholder for manager overtime hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Provides a hook to fetch task export data, disabled by default.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Wraps toast notifications and normalizes error handling using translations.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Stub hooks returning empty overtime data due to removed backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal placeholder noting that feature-specific hooks live elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Hooks for selecting assistant/manager roles and invalidating related auth queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Task CRUD hooks for fetching, creating, completing, and resetting tasks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update user profiles using an actor interface.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context provider with language persistence and key‑based translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and a nested translations object used for UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Provides tabbed navigation between manager overtime and task statistics pages.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Shows a user picker and overtime sections but disables export and backend overtime functionality.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Displays task statistics and audit logs and supports exporting task data to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history, showing a loading state while data is fetched.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows the task list and creation dialog, and resets recurring tasks on mount.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports arrays of objects to CSV files with quoting and download handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, animations, and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s current ICP-based project state, requirements, architectural notes, issues, and desired updates including identity login, role flow, and avatar changes.
